comment.author: 32162360@N00
32162360@N00
comment._content: Biography of Harry Finn mentions his wife Catherine (nee Scott), two daughters and a son. www.adb.online.anu.edu.au/biogs/A080526b.htm I think one daughter is standing behind her sister. Please State Records NSW, a high resolution image would be interesting. I am no genealogist, but it would be fun to find out the children's names and histories.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Here you go, a larger version!

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw]  Thank you, that large size is great, but I was wrong - there is a daughter missing.  And a small white dog has appeared.  It must have been a wonderful place to live at the time.  I expect they told the children there were ferries at the bottom of the garden!
